Title: Now
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Corey Reed
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Chandler Riggs
Plot: Deanna begins to question her leadership. Meanwhile, Maggie shares a secret with Aaron while searching for Glenn, as the herd approaches the safe-zone.
